description: The 5% reduction is aimed at stimulating the hospitality sector in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic.
title: Isle of Man cuts VAT on food and attractions to 5%
title_page: Isle of Man cuts VAT on food and attractions to 5% - BBC News
maintext: Measures to control the spread of the virus, which include the closure of the island's border and the cancellation of the TT races, have impacted many businesses that rely on the island's tourist trade.
